content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] [HJ] CopyBehavior
content.description: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Allow to copy the default behavior from one ship to another. See video here : https://youtu.be/LOUMIngHxJQ
